long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of losing track of the web pages you've visited? Do you want a simple way to save and reopen your browsing sessions? Look no further! TabTrackerPro is your ultimate solution for managing your browsing history, saving URLs, and boosting productivity.

Why Choose TabTrackerPro?
TabTrackerPro is designed to make your online browsing experience smoother and more efficient. With its simple yet powerful features, you can:

Save All Visited URLs: Quickly save all the web pages you've visited as a .txt file for future reference.
Reopen Saved Tabs: Upload your saved .txt file and instantly reopen all URLs in new tabs.
Streamline Productivity: Organize your tabs and never lose important web pages again.
User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive design for seamless usage.
Privacy First: No data is collected or shared. Everything happens locally on your device.
Key Features
Save URLs with One Click:

Automatically track the web pages you visit and save them as a .txt file with the current date and time as the filename.
Perfect for creating a backup of your tabs or bookmarking multiple pages at once.
Reopen Saved Sessions:

Upload a .txt file containing saved URLs, and TabTrackerPro will open all the links in separate tabs.
Great for revisiting research, projects, or shopping lists.
Minimal Permissions:

Only requires the necessary permissions to access tab URLs, ensuring your security and privacy.
Customizable Workflow:

Use TabTrackerPro to organize your work, research, or study sessions.
Lightweight and Fast:

TabTracker Pro


Save and manage visited URLs effortlessly. Download your browsing history as a .txt file or upload it to reopen pages.

Small in size, quick to install, and runs efficiently without slowing down your browser.
Who Can Benefit from TabTrackerPro?
Students and Researchers: Save and organize tabs for research projects, assignments, or essays.
Professionals: Manage and revisit tabs for work, meetings, or client interactions.
Shoppers and Planners: Save shopping carts, wish lists, or trip planning details for later use.
Casual Browsers: Keep track of interesting articles, videos, or resources without cluttering bookmarks.
How It Works
Track Your URLs:

TabTrackerPro monitors the pages you visit while browsing.
Save Your Session:

Click the "Save URLs" button to download a .txt file containing all visited URLs.
Reopen URLs:

Upload the .txt file with saved URLs, and TabTrackerPro will open each URL in a new tab.
Why TabTrackerPro Stands Out
Privacy-Centric: No user data is collected, ensuring your browsing history stays private.
Simple and Intuitive: Easy for anyone to use, with a clean and responsive design.
Customizable File Naming: Save sessions with unique filenames that include the current date and time.
Time-Saving: Quickly save and reopen tabs without relying on bookmarks or external tools.
Security and Privacy
Your privacy is our priority. TabTrackerPro processes everything locally on your device. None of your browsing data is collected or shared with third parties. You remain in control of your information at all times.

Installation and Usage
Install TabTrackerPro from the Chrome Web Store.
Click the TabTrackerPro icon in the browser toolbar to open the popup.
Use the "Save URLs" button to download your visited URLs as a .txt file.
Use the file upload feature to reopen your saved tabs.
Upcoming Features
We are constantly working to make TabTrackerPro even better! Here’s what’s coming soon:

Cross-Device Syncing: Save and access tabs across multiple devices.
Advanced Filters: Save only specific tabs based on criteria like domain or keywords.
Cloud Backup (Optional): Optionally sync your sessions with secure cloud storage.
Dark Mode: For those who prefer a darker UI experience.
Support and Feedback
We value your feedback! If you have questions, suggestions, or issues, feel free to contact us at hcheginidesign@gmail.com. We are committed to providing you with the best experience possible.

Try TabTrackerPro Today!
Say goodbye to losing important tabs or struggling with unorganized browsing sessions. Download TabTrackerPro now and take control of your online productivity.

TabTrackerPro – Save. Manage. Reopen. Simplify Your Tabs!
